long_description: Give your pup a soft window seat that isn't your lap. The Kurgo Skybox booster seat features a built-in adjustable tether that attaches to any dog harness so they stay safely inside while you drive. Holds a dog weighing up to 30 lbs.; metal supports add structural integrity. Washable padded liner keeps seat fresh and clean; zippered side pockets store treats and other small items. Kurgo Skybox booster seat installs quickly and easily, and collapses for storage.
short_description: Give your pup a soft window seat that isn't your lap. The Kurgo Skybox booster seat features a built-in adjustable tether that attaches to any dog harness so they stay safely inside while you drive.
